content: {"name": "Franklin County Job and Family Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://sebt.ohio.gov/apply/", "email": "", "url": "http://www.benefits.ohio.gov/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1055 Mount Vernon Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "King-Lincoln Bronzeville", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43203", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9711247, "longitude": -82.9737615}, "phones": [{"number": "(844) 640-6446", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Assists clients with SNAP applications, Social Security, Medicaid and Medicare, and other safety net benefits from the city, state, and federal government"}]}
